name: Basic Tee
description: A comfortable and stylish cotton t-shirt perfect for daily wear. Made from soft, breathable fabric to keep you cool and confident.

name: Premium Hoodie
header: Elevated Warmth with a Premium Feel
description: Stay warm and cozy with this high-quality hoodie. Features a soft fleece lining and adjustable drawstring hood for maximum comfort and versatility.

name: Denim Jeans
description: Classic fit jeans made from durable denim. Designed for everyday wear with a relaxed fit and timeless style that never goes out of fashion.

name: Running Sneakers
description: Lightweight sneakers designed for everyday wear. Supportive cushioning, breathable mesh, and a sleek design that works on and off the track.

name: Classic Backpack
description: A durable backpack with plenty of space for your essentials. Ideal for work, school, or travel with multiple compartments and ergonomic straps.

name: Stylish Cap
header: Sun-Ready Style with a Modern Edge
description: A trendy cap for sunny days. Adjustable fit with a breathable design that complements your casual looks while keeping you shaded and stylish.

name: Winter Jacket
description: Stay warm during cold days with this insulated winter jacket. Built with windproof and water-resistant materials to keep you protected and comfortable.

name: Underwear
description: Soft, supportive underwear made for all-day wear. Breathable, stretchy, and designed to move with you for ultimate comfort and fit.
